description: Elven Longbow, crafted from the wood of the Mallorn trees of Lothlorien, enchanted for accuracy
Dwarven Battle Axe, forged in the depths of the Lonely Mountain, unbreakable and sharp
Rohan's Rider Sword, a fine steel blade used by the horse-lords of Rohan
Gondorian Sword, a well-balanced sword from the forges of Minas Tirith
Wizard's Staff, imbued with ancient magic, once belonging to a powerful wizard
Orcish Scimitar, a crude yet effective weapon used by the orcs of Mordor
Hobbit's Sling, a simple but accurate ranged weapon favored by the Hobbits
Elven Dagger, a sharp and lightweight blade, easily concealed
Uruk-Hai Sword, a large and brutal weapon wielded by Saruman's elite Uruk-Hai
Ent's Branch, a mighty weapon used by the Ents, capable of crushing stone
Balrog's Whip, a fiery weapon wielded by the Balrog of Moria, fearsome and destructive
Nazgul's Sword, a dark blade carried by the Ringwraiths, instilling terror in its foes
